ItemDesc: The amber that rains from the Amber Lord's body when THEY swing the celestial hammer. Used to level up Traces significantly for <color=#f29e38ff>Preservation</color> characters.
ItemBGDesc: Although Pier Point sent out Meteor Hunters and intercepted most of the meteors, the brightest one among all these shooting stars will always only be seen by the chosen one.\n\n"It is a part of the divine body of the Aeon, albeit an insignificant one. Only the chosen ones, with their minds as steadfast as cornerstones and having endured challenges and hardships, can chisel apart this amber and unleash the crystalized light within."
